attributes.additional_details: Kids minds are always stuffed with so many things in one day and it over works kids brains making them forget things straight away because their brains are on overload,and is one of the main reasons why kids mess about and when they are older get no where in life.
attributes.background: kids need time to think and relax,even though kids are going to school and being taught things doesn’t mean they are actually learning,kids are taught so many things in 6 or more hours,teachers try hard to fit loads of things into one lesson but kids need more time for their brains to breath.
